Html:
Hello, I'm new to GoblinXNA.

After I finally successfully compiled and ran the CameraCalibrationtool in GoblinXNA,the program did detect my camera and the light of my camera was on.

The problem is, once the program tried detect the checkerboard pattern, it shut down right away.

I would like to ask is there something missing in my process of calibration?

welcome to the club. you probably have missing or corrupt dll's, i would think. try to copy over dll's ending with "d" as well to your unmanaged folder, although they are not on the installation manual. other than that, i can suggest start over with installation. i think i tried it couple of times to get it right when i first installed.
